item.title: NEM
item.description: score:46 Chances: The S&P 500 index has trended higher by almost 25% this year. Expansionary policies will not only stimulate economic growth but also inject liquidity into the financial system. Gold has recently achieved an unprecedented milestone, surging to an all-time high of $2,135 per ounce.
